decks.notes: This Selesnya Aggro deck focuses on playing efficiently costed creatures like Archon of Emeria, Thalia, and Skyclave Apparition while ramping with mana dorks like Elvish Mystic and Llanowar Elves. Collected Company helps to dig for more threats while providing card advantage. The deck aims to apply pressure early and disrupt opponents' game plan with cards like Ouroboroid and Aven Interrupter. Elspeth, Storm Slayer provides a powerful finisher to close out games. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents quickly and efficiently to secure victory.

The main concept of this Golgari Aggro deck is to focus on fast-paced aggression by utilizing efficient creatures like Sentinel of the Nameless City and Ouroboroid, along with removal spells like Fatal Push and Abrupt Decay to control the board. The deck also includes disruption tools like Thoughtseize and Tear Asunder to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The land base is designed to support the color requirements of the deck and provide flexibility in mana production. The overall strategy is to overwhelm the opponent with early aggression while maintaining control with removal and disruption spells.

The key concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with fast and aggressive creatures and spells, focusing on dealing damage quickly and efficiently. With cards like Monastery Swiftspear, Soul-Scar Mage, and Emberheart Challenger, along with burn spells like Burst Lightning and Reckless Rage, the deck aims to put pressure on the opponent early in the game. The deck also includes some disruptive elements like Boomerang Basics and Academic Dispute to further disrupt the opponent's game plan. Overall, the deck is designed to be proactive and aggressive in nature.

The deck focuses on controlling the opponent's actions by using counterspells, removal spells, and card draw to outvalue them. It also utilizes the Companion mechanic to bring an additional creature to the battlefield. The deck has a mix of efficient threats like Elspeth, Storm Slayer and Teferi, Hero of Dominaria, as well as disruptive spells like Dovin's Veto and Supreme Verdict. The mana base is built to support the control strategy with a mix of dual lands and utility lands. Overall, the deck aims to maintain control of the game and grind out a victory.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with small, efficient creatures and powerful removal spells. By playing low-cost creatures like Novice Inspector and Ornithopter, the deck aims to deal consistent damage early on. Portable Hole and Gleeful Demolition provide removal options to clear the way for attacks. Venerated Loxodon offers a powerful boost to the team, while Knight-Errant of Eos and Cosmogrand Zenith provide additional support and card draw. The deck's mana base is optimized to consistently play threats and answer opposing plays efficiently.

The deck focuses on utilizing Lotus Field to generate a large amount of mana quickly, allowing for explosive plays with cards like Scapeshift and Crumbling Vestige. The goal is to ramp up mana as quickly as possible, setting up for a combo finish with cards like The Wandering Minstrel and Lumra, Bellow of the Woods. Utilizing resources like Underground Mortuary and Port of Karfell, the deck aims to control the board and overwhelm the opponent with powerful spells and abilities.

This deck focuses on quickly building up a board presence with efficient creatures like Elvish Mystic and Badgermole Cub. It also utilizes disruptive spells like Skyclave Apparition and Seam Rip to control the opponent's board. The inclusion of cards like Armored Scrapgorger and Ouroboroid allows for resilience against removal spells. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a mix of aggression and disruption, while also having access to powerful finishers like Elspeth, Storm Slayer to close out the game.

This deck focuses on utilizing efficient creatures like Archon of Emeria and Thalia, Guardian of Thraben to quickly apply pressure on the opponent. It also includes cards like Collected Company to generate additional threats and disrupt the opponent's game plan. The mana base is optimized to ensure consistent early plays and the inclusion of cards like Skyclave Apparition provides removal options. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy while disrupting their game plan with disruptive creatures and spells.

This UW Control deck focuses on controlling the game through counterspells, removal, and card advantage. It also utilizes alternate win conditions such as Consult the Star Charts and March of Otherworldly Light. The inclusion of the companion Kaheera adds additional synergy and versatility to the deck. Overall, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while slowly building up its resources to secure a win through overwhelming control.

The main concept of this Boros Aggro deck is to quickly equip creatures with powerful equipment cards like Colossus Hammer and Leyline Axe to deal massive damage to opponents. The deck also utilizes cards like Sigarda's Aid and Kellan, the Fae-Blooded to efficiently equip these items for maximum impact. With a focus on quick and aggressive plays, supported by efficient creatures like Fervent Champion and clouds, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a fast and powerful offensive strategy in order to win the game as quickly as possible.

The key concept of this Selesnya Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive gameplay strategy. By utilizing efficient creatures like Archon of Emeria and Skyclave Apparition, along with mana acceleration from Elvish Mystic and Llanowar Elves, the deck aims to quickly establish a board presence and apply pressure. Cards like Collected Company and Elspeth, Storm's Slayer provide additional value and potential finishers. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Thalia, Guardian of Thraben to slow down the opponent's game plan and maintain control of the battlefield.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game by disrupting the opponent's strategy with cards like Thoughtseize, Duress, and Fatal Push, while also dealing with threats using removal spells like Go for the Throat and Vanishing Verse. The deck also utilizes creatures like Gifted Aetherborn and Preacher of the Schism to establish a board presence and gain life. Additionally, the deck includes powerful finishers like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Blade of the Oni to close out games against the opponent.

The main concept of this Selesnya Aggro deck is to establish early board presence with efficient creatures like Elvish Mystic and Llanowar Elves, and disrupt the opponent's game plan with cards like Thalia, Guardian of Thraben and Archon of Emeria. The deck also aims to control the board with cards like Skyclave Apparition and Collected Company, while finishing off the opponent with powerful threats like Elspeth, Storm Slayer and Ouroboroid. By combining aggression with disruption and control elements, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and secure a quick victory.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly ramp up mana through cards like Lotus Field and Arboreal Grazer, allowing the player to easily cast powerful spells such as Scapeshift and Lumra, Bellow of the Woods. The deck also utilizes lands like Port of Karfell and Otawara, Soaring City to generate additional resources and control the board. By efficiently generating mana and drawing cards, the player aims to set up a game-winning combo or overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures and spells.

The main concept of this UR Aggro deck is to quickly deal damage to the opponent by utilizing cheap spells and aggressive creatures. Using cards like Monastery Swiftspear and Soul-Scar Mage, the deck aims to apply pressure early and maintain it throughout the game. Spells like Burst Lightning and Reckless Rage help control the board and clear the way for attacking creatures. The deck's mana base and card choices allow for flexibility and adaptability in different match-ups, making it a versatile and dynamic aggro archetype.

The key concept of this deck is to overwhelm your opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells in order to quickly reduce their life total to zero. By utilizing low-cost creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Soul-Scar Mage, along with efficient burn spells like Burst Lightning and Reckless Rage, this deck aims to apply constant pressure and finish the game before the opponent can stabilize. The inclusion of card draw and mana fixing ensures consistency in maintaining a fast and aggressive game plan.
